summary: Contoso Wireless streaming service is a great way to stay connected and up-to-date with the latest technology. It offers streaming packages that include access to its library of movies, music, and more. The basic package starts at $9.99 per month and there are additional packages with premium channels and special features for an additional fee. Customers can also get discounts on select packages, such as 10% off when they sign up for an annual subscription. There is a free 7-day trial available for new customers, as well as 24/7 customer support and free software updates.
